description:
Hibio is a student, who easily becomes angry. He uses force to solve the problems, but he has caring, polite and nice personality, that sometimes could be misunderstood to his cheeky/delinquent behaviour. He is actually good at cooking.
His parents are divorced, he lives together with his father. At first he is totally against to become Nima`s husband, but then he will slowly accept it.
name: Hibino Hibio
